page.title: 16A DAY AT NUGENT HOUSE
page.content: At 7.30a.m.I get up and air the beds. We wash and dress in school uniform, it is grey with black and red tie.It is then breakfast, cereal, toast and coffee.We eat it all because there is nothing else to eat until 12.00 lunch. Then back to house units to make beds, they all have continental quilts. We each have a set job, if it is not done properly I can't go out for playtime. My job is to tidy the common room, others are cleaning toilets and hoovering.At playtime we play on B.M.X on the fields or playground.Assembly is 9.15 to 9.30, then it is the dreadful time when lessons start english and math before lunch, after it is science,history, geography, and crafts. At 4p.m.house parents take us back to the unit where we change and have tea,then homework.Activities are electronics and modelling,bed 9pm
